name: South African Historic Monuments by Province

properties.name: Robben Island
properties.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site; prison of Nelson Mandela. Departure point from Cape Town.

properties.name: Castle of Good Hope
properties.description: Oldest surviving colonial building in South Africa (1666).

properties.name: Cango Caves
properties.description: 20-million-year-old cave system with evidence of early San inhabitation and rock art.

properties.name: Cradle of Humankind
properties.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site; Sterkfontein Caves and hominid fossils.

properties.name: Apartheid Museum
properties.description: Primary museum detailing the rise and fall of Apartheid in Johannesburg.

properties.name: Union Buildings
properties.description: Seat of government in Pretoria; site of Mandela's inauguration.

properties.name: uKhahlamba-Drakensberg Park (Rock Art)
properties.description: UNESCO Site; San rock art and natural beauty.

properties.name: Isandlwana Battlefield
properties.description: Key Anglo-Zulu War battle site (1879).

properties.name: Nelson Mandela Capture Site
properties.description: Site of Mandela's 1964 arrest, featuring a major sculpture.

properties.name: Nelson Mandela Museum (Qunu)
properties.description: Memorials and exhibits related to Mandelaâ€™s life in his home region.

properties.name: Sarah Baartman Heritage Site
properties.description: Memorial and burial site for the Khoikhoi woman, Sarah Baartman.

properties.name: Old Fort (Makhanda / Grahamstown)
properties.description: Historic military structure from the Frontier Wars era.

properties.name: Vredefort Dome
properties.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site; largest, oldest verified meteorite impact crater.

properties.name: Anglo-Boer War Museum
properties.description: Museum dedicated to the history of the South African Wars.

properties.name: Basotho Cultural Village
properties.description: A living museum celebrating the tradition and culture of the South Sotho people.

properties.name: Mapungubwe Cultural Landscape
properties.description: UNESCO Site; capital of a pre-colonial kingdom (9th-14th centuries).

properties.name: Makapans Valley and Limeworks
properties.description: Fossil and archaeological site with evidence of early human ancestors.

properties.name: Thulamela Ruins
properties.description: Late Iron Age stone-walled fortress in Kruger National Park.

properties.name: Barberton Makhonjwa Mountains
properties.description: UNESCO Site; one of the world's oldest geological structures.

properties.name: Blyde River Canyon (Bourke's Luck Potholes)
properties.description: Significant natural landmark and heritage area on the Panorama Route.

properties.name: Sudwala Caves
properties.description: One of the world's oldest cave systems, historically significant.

properties.name: Taung Skull Site
properties.description: Site where the 'Taung Child' fossil was discovered, a key hominid find.

properties.name: Kaditshwene Cultural Landscape (Ruins)
properties.description: Extensive ruins of a large pre-colonial Tswana settlement.

properties.name: Kedar Heritage Lodge / Boekenhoutfontein
properties.description: Historical home of President Paul Kruger

properties.name: Richtersveld Cultural Landscape
properties.description: UNESCO Site; cultural heartland of the Nama people.

properties.name: Kimberley's Big Hole and Mine Museum
properties.description: Large, hand-dug diamond mine and museum of the diamond rush era.

properties.name: Wonderwerk Cave
properties.description: Cave with evidence of human occupation dating back millions of years.

properties.name: Cape Agulhas (Southernmost Tip)
properties.description: The geographical meeting point of the Atlantic and Indian Oceans.

properties.name: SKA MeerKAT Radio Telescope
properties.description: Advanced research facility for radio astronomy in the Karoo.

properties.name: Soweto Towers (Orlando Towers)
properties.description: Iconic, brightly painted cooling towers used for extreme sports.

properties.name: Lion & Safari Park
properties.description: Major accessible wildlife conservation and interaction centre.

properties.name: Port of Durban
properties.description: The busiest commercial seaport in Africa, an economic hub.

properties.name: Midmar Dam
properties.description: Large water body famous for the annual Midmar Mile open-water swim.

properties.name: Hogsback Village and Forest
properties.description: Misty, scenic village and forest often compared to Tolkien's settings.

properties.name: Aliwal Shoal (Marine Protected Area)
properties.description: World-renowned marine protected area and dive site (represented by a coastal point).

properties.name: Gariep Dam
properties.description: South Africa's largest storage dam, creating a massive inland lake.

properties.name: Sterkfontein Dam Nature Reserve
properties.description: South Africa's third-largest dam, located in the Drakensberg foothills.

properties.name: Kruger National Park (Punda Maria Gate)

properties.name: Tzaneen Dam
properties.description: Key landmark in the region known as South Africa's 'food basket'.

properties.name: Witbank Dam (Emalahleni)
properties.description: Large dam symbolizing the province's coal and energy production.

properties.name: Long Tom Pass
properties.description: Scenic mountain pass with historical Anglo-Boer War significance.

properties.name: Augrabies Falls National Park
properties.description: Dramatic waterfalls on the Orange River, a major natural wonder.

properties.name: Carnarvon Hotel (Karoo Heritage)
properties.description: Historic small-town hotel in the heart of the remote Karoo region.

properties.name: Hartbeespoort Dam
properties.description: Major leisure, water sports, and cableway hub close to Gauteng.

properties.name: Madikwe Game Reserve
properties.description: A large, malaria-free 'Big Five' game reserve near the Botswana border.
